body_html: I am using Ubuntu 16.04. If go to "Nvidia X server settings" you can see the list of GPUs. It shows each GPU utilization and used memory. I suppose the CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES="index", at here index 0,1,2,3 should be same as the index show in "Nvidia X server settings". is that correct?
